com.phunware.location.provider

Class PwAbstractLocationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.phunware.location.provider.PwAbstractLocationProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PwLocationProvider
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PwFusedLocationProvider, PwMockLocationProvider, PwMseLocationProvider, PwQcLocationProvider, PwSlLocationProvider

    public abstract class PwAbstractLocationProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements PwLocationProvider
    Abstract class that defines an location provider.
